channel.title: 测试 on vskity
channel.description: Recent content in 测试 on vskity

item.title: String连接性能测试
item.description: Golang String类型 连接性能测试 BenchmarkTest strings.Join() 代码如下： func BenchmarkString(b *testing.B) { str := strings.Repeat("r", n) // n=[20,400,8000] var dst string for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ { dst = strings.Join([]string{dst}, str) } } 第一组 每次连接长度为20 goos: windows goarch: amd64 pkg: github.com/vskity/test BenchmarkString-4 300000000 5.24 ns/op 0 B/op 0 allocs/op BenchmarkString-4 300000000 5.20 ns/op 0 B/op 0 allocs/op BenchmarkString-4 300000000 5.28 ns/op 0 B/op 0 allocs/op BenchmarkString-4 300000000 5.
